Mexico City can be very hectic, you can easily spend half of your life in traffic. I felt it was a luxury to be able to walk to places without using a car.
I knew I wanted to live in a central location, close to the classic neighborhoods â€“ Condesa, Roma and Polanco are some of the most well-known, but also in high demand.
